Package protocol.servers

Class LocalNodeConnectionHandler

java.lang.Object
protocol.servers.LocalNodeConnectionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class LocalNodeConnectionHandler extends Object implements Runnable
Class that represents the new thread when a new client establishes a new connection to a local node

  • Constructor Details

    • LocalNodeConnectionHandler

      public LocalNodeConnectionHandler​(Socket clientSocket, List<SendPacket<?>> packetsToSend, List<LocalNodeConnectionHandler> serverClients, PacketTrafficHandler packetTrafficHandler, int port)
      Class constructor
      Parameters:
      clientSocket - the client socket
      packetsToSend - the queue of packets that the local node has to send to the central node
      serverClients - the list of threads (clients) connected the local node
      packetTrafficHandler - object that coordinates the access to the list of 'packetsToSend'
      port - the local node port
